prompts: Generate a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a wolf with sharp features and a sleek body.
Create a Pokemon that has a fierce appearance, combining black and gray colors with a wild mane.
Show me a canine Pokemon with a stealthy look, featuring bright red markings on its face.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing agility and cunning in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies loyalty and strength, with a muscular build and an intimidating stance.
Make a Pokemon that roams the forest at night, with a dark coat and piercing eyes.
Give me a Pokemon that can easily blend into its surroundings, thanks to its dark fur and alert posture.
